Member Function Documentation

Numbers_Words_fr_BE._splitNumber ( $  num  ) 

Split a number to groups of three-digit numbers.

Parameters:
mixed $num An integer or its string representation that need to be split
Returns:
array Groups of three-digit numbers.
private
Author:
Kouber Saparev <kouber@php.net>
Since:
PHP 4.2.3

Numbers_Words_fr_BE._showDigitsGroup ( $  num,
$  last = false 
)

Converts a three-digit number to its word representation in French language.

Parameters:
integer $num An integer between 1 and 999 inclusive.
boolean $last A flag, that determines if it is the last group of digits - this is used to accord the plural suffix of the "hundreds". Example: 200 = "deux cents", but 200000 = "deux cent mille".
Returns:
string The words for the given number.
private
Author:
Kouber Saparev <kouber@php.net>

Numbers_Words_fr_BE.toWords ( $  num = 0  ) 

Converts a number to its word representation in French language.

Parameters:
integer $num An integer (or its string representation) between 9.99*-10^302 and 9.99*10^302 (999 centillions) that need to be converted to words
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation
public
Author:
Kouber Saparev <kouber@php.net>
